en-US.STR_RES_CUR_HELP: The preferred resolution of the Graphics Console at next boot. It might be unset, or even invalid (hence ignored) wrt. the video RAM size.
en-US.STR_RES_NEXT: Change Preferred Resolution for Next Boot
en-US.STR_RES_NEXT_HELP: You can specify a new preference for the Graphics Console here. The list is filtered against the video RAM size.
